h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Black Loong - Chapter 2 Secret Boss
content: Beyond this enemy, you'll see a sandfall. Head toward it and you can interact with it to remove the sand and enter a secret area Hidden Loong Cavern, where you'll fight Black Loong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Black Loong - Chapter 2 Secret Boss'.
The content is as follows:
Beyond this enemy, you'll see a sandfall. Head toward it and you can interact with it to remove the sand and enter a secret area Hidden Loong Cavern, where you'll fight Black Loong.
